text:
Going Global - Available in over 60 countries

We now offer international shipping through global provider, Borderfree. As you shop, you will see prices in your selected currency. You can change where you would like to ship your items in the top right corner of our website. To learn more about international shipping, please visit our International Orders page.

You are currently shipping to US in USD Currency change

PLEASE NOTE:

Some items are not eligible for international shipping. Please look for eligibility notifications on our product pages, or view our guidelines to see which items are ineligible.

All international orders must have a ship-to destination outside of the United States. We cannot support customers with international billing addresses shipping to U.S. addresses.

Free Shipping promotions cannot be applied to International Orders.

You can view your complete order total, including shipping fees, custom tariffs and taxes, during checkout.

*We are sorry that we no longer ship to the Province of Quebec, Canada.

Continue Shopping

title: Harry Potter™ Platform 9 3/4™ Pillow Cover

meta_data.description: All aboard! Take the Platform 9 3/4 train each night with this ultrasoft and charming pillow. Made from pure magical cotton in an enchanting purple hue, this plush and cozy pillow will give your Hogwarts™ room a magical
